sentences.sContent: There was still half an hour left in which to drive to the station, buy the last weeklies at the bookstall with the air of seasoned travellers.
sentences.sContent_eng: There was still half an hour left in which to drive to the station, buy the last weeklies at the bookstall with the air of seasoned travellers.
sentences.sCn: 还有半小时的光景，供他们坐车到火车站，摆出见过世面的旅客的样干，在车站的书摊上买几份近期周刊。

trans.tranOther: a small shop that has an open front and sells books and magazines, often at a railway station
